messages.content: What is the purpose of this project?
The purpose of this project is to introduce animated optical illusions into ComfyUI.
How can one install the Custom Node?
The Custom Node can be installed using the ComfyUI Manager or by manually following the steps outlined on the installation page.
What is the version of this project?
The version of this project is v1.0.
What features does this Custom Node offer?
The Custom Node offers the ability to display animated optical illusions within ComfyUI.
What is the GitHub repository for this project?
The GitHub repository for this project is https://github.com/ZHO-ZHO-ZHO/ComfyUI-Animated-optical-illusions.
The Animated-Optical-Illusion was created by RaskiTech.
What does the term 'optical illusion' refer to?
An optical illusion is a perceptual phenomenon where the brain interprets visual stimuli differently than how the visual stimuli actually exist.
